    • Constructor Detail

      • BombSquare

        public BombSquare(int x,
                  int y,
                  GameBoard board)
        Create a new BombSquare, which can be placed on a GameBoard.
        Parameters:
        x - the x co-ordinate of this square on the game board.
        y - the y co-ordinate of this square on the game board.
        board - object reference to the GameBoard this square is part of

    • Method Detail

      • leftClicked

        public void leftClicked()
        Initiated by the left mouse click. Sets the image of the game square: empty, bomb, or a number of bombs in surrounding game squares.
        Specified by:
        leftClicked in class GameSquare

      • displaySquares

        public void displaySquares(GameSquare square)
        Parameters:
        square - the square on the game board.

      • rightClicked

        public void rightClicked()
        Initiated by the right mouse click. Sets the flag on the square by the rules of the game. Flag can only be set on blank squares.
        Specified by:
        rightClicked in class GameSquare

      • getVisited

        public boolean getVisited()
        Returns:
        if the square was visited.
